title: Bachelorette's Mike Johnson awkwardly flirts with Keke Palmer on live TV... after Demi Lovato date
text:
Mike Johnson may not have found love on The Bachelorette, but he's not giving up just yet.

He was recently linked to Demi Lovato, whom he revealed 'kisses really well' after carrying on a public flirtation.

Now, it appears he's set his sights on Keke Palmer after he was seen making an awkward move on the star on live television.

On the hunt: It appears Bachelorette star Mike Johnson has set his sights on Keke Palmer, after making an awkward move on live television

The 31-year-old appeared Monday on the ABC morning talk show Strahan, Sara and Keke, of which Palmer has become the newest addition.

The conversation naturally touched on his romance with Lovato, of which he said: 'I made a mistake. I don't like dating in public.'

He then quickly transitioned to asking out Palmer: 'But if I were to ask you if we could go on a date in public...'

Before he could finish his sentence, the audience drowned him out with applause as the Hustlers star was visibly uncomfortable.

As with any celebrity romance worth shipping these days, their relationship began on social media.

An avid fan of The Bachelorette, Lovato took to her Instagram story as she watched Mike on the show, writing: 'Mike I accept your rose'

Shortly after, when Johnson was eliminated, he posted to Twitter: 'Jus saying, my future wife though girl you ready for smiles, adventure, comfort, growth, honesty, laughter, me falling using my inhaler and kissing your stretch marks and imperfections. Where u hiding'

It seemed to have gotten the Glee star's attention, as she replied in a now-deleted tweet: 'I’M RIGHT HERE MIKE I’M RIGHT HERE BOO MY MOM ALREADY LOVES YOU TOO.'
